en-US.summary: An Alexa Skill that allows you to keep track of chores and tasks
examplePhrases: Alexa tell chore tracker to add mowing the lawn
Alexa tell chore tracker to add doing the dishes
Alexa ask chore tracker to list off my chores
en-US.name: alexa-chore-tracker
en-US.description: An Alexa Skill that allows you to keep track of chores and tasks
